name: Metasequoia Document
summary: 3D image created by Metasequoia, a 3D modeling program; saves the 3D geometry and pose information for a character or other object; also stores applied textures; uses plain text formatting and can be exported to common 3D formats, including .DXF , .LWO , .3DS , and .OBJ .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
